Name: Stellar Predator
Title: Fischl: Stellar Predator
Desc: "The instant in which Ozvaldo Hrafnavins shows his great might."
Source: Reward for inviting Fischl to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Stellar Predator
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1401]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1401] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S14012]</color> once.
When your $[A1401], who has this card equipped, creates an <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114011]</color>, <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114011]</color> will gain the following effect:  after $[A1401] uses a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color>: Deal 2 $[K104]. (Consumes $[K3])
(You must have $[A1401] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

K104.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>
K104.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Superconduct</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Quicken</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

K104.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>
K104.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Superconduct</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Quicken</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
